Shortened to Etahi!\""},{"lineNumber":70592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっひょー！　ちゃーんと説明するから！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Woohoo! I'll properly explain it!\""},{"lineNumber":70593,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ね、ね、聞いて聞いて、聞いててね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, hey, listen, listen, please listen!\""},{"lineNumber":70594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さって、エターナルヒーローとは何か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then, what are the Eternal Heroes?\""},{"lineNumber":70595,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今を遡ること1500年前ほどにいた、","translatedEnglishLine":"They were a party from about 1500 years ago,"},{"lineNumber":70596,"originalJapaneseLine":"　5人の史上最高のパーティーのことよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"five of the greatest party members in history.\""},{"lineNumber":70597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「彼らはそれぞれに当時の魔王、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Each of them sought power to fight against the Demon Lord of the time,"},{"lineNumber":70598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王ジル、そして魔人達と戦う為の","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Lord Jill, and the demon fiends,"},{"lineNumber":70599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　力を求めて冒険していました」","translatedEnglishLine":"and went on adventures in search of that power.\""},{"lineNumber":70600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その冒険がどういう結末を見たか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What kind of end those adventures met...\""},{"lineNumber":70601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それがもう！　語るも涙、聞くも涙の物語！","translatedEnglishLine":"That's a story full of tears to tell, and tears to hear!"},{"lineNumber":70602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おーいおいおい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, come on, come on!"},{"lineNumber":70603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「詳しいことは画像の説明を見てもらうとして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll leave the detailed explanation to the image caption..."},{"lineNumber":70604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人が倒せる魔剣カオスさん、聖刀日光さんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demonic sword Chaos who can defeat demons, and the holy sword Nikkō,"},{"lineNumber":70605,"originalJapaneseLine":"　現在に至る前、人間時代のパーティーだと","translatedEnglishLine":"before the present time, were part of a human-era party,"},{"lineNumber":70606,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思ってもらえばオーケかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"if you think of it that way, it's fine."},{"lineNumber":70607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぶっちゃけストーリーにガツンとは絡まないから、","translatedEnglishLine":"To be honest, this doesn't heavily affect the main story,"},{"lineNumber":70608,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カオス、日光、カフェ、ホ・ラガ、コンクリ男、","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos, Nikkō, Café, Ho-Raga, Concrete Man,"},{"lineNumber":70609,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この五人仲間だったんだーへーと思っといて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"just keep in mind that these five were comrades—how about that!"},{"lineNumber":70610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時には街を支配する魔物達を懲らしめ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes punishing the monsters that ruled cities,"},{"lineNumber":70611,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時には当時の魔王であるジル様が作っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"sometimes liberating the human farms created by Demon Lord Jill,"},{"lineNumber":70612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間を奴隷化する人間牧場の開放を行ったり","translatedEnglishLine":"which enslaved humans."},{"lineNumber":70613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ジル期という歴史上でもかなり厳しい時代を、","translatedEnglishLine":"They lived through the harsh era known historically as the Jill Period,"},{"lineNumber":70614,"originalJapaneseLine":"　五人は駆け抜けていたそうよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"the five of them persevered through it all."},{"lineNumber":70615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろん、最高のパーティーと言えど、","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, even as the greatest party,"},{"lineNumber":70616,"originalJapaneseLine":"　当時はあまりに魔軍の勢力が強く、","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon army's power was overwhelming at the time,"},{"lineNumber":70617,"originalJapaneseLine":"　順風満帆とはいかなかったそうだけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":"so things didn't always go smoothly for them."},{"lineNumber":70618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみにこのパーティーにいたカフェさんは、","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, Café from this party,"},{"lineNumber":70619,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶世の美女に姿を変えられていたものの、","translatedEnglishLine":"was transformed into an unparalleled beauty,"},{"lineNumber":70620,"originalJapaneseLine":"　現在は呪いが解かれ元のお姿に","translatedEnglishLine":"but now the curse has been lifted and she returned to her original form."},{"lineNumber":70621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「自分の姿への劣等感から美女になったけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"She became a beauty out of an inferiority complex about her appearance,"},{"lineNumber":70622,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元の姿も充分可愛いわよねー。","translatedEnglishLine":"but her original form is also pretty cute, right?"},{"lineNumber":70623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　恋する乙女心は複雑なのかしら」","translatedEnglishLine":"A maiden's heart in love is complicated, I suppose."},{"lineNumber":70624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そうそう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh yes, and speaking of which,"},{"lineNumber":70625,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逆にそんなカフェさんが気になっていたのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"what Café was interested in, conversely,"},{"lineNumber":70626,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は魔剣と化したカオスさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"is Chaos, who has become a demonic sword now."},{"lineNumber":70627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでも、魔人に殺された恋人が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, his lover who was killed by demons"},{"lineNumber":70628,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっとカフェさんに似ていたんですって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"somewhat resembled Café..."},{"lineNumber":70629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その気になる、が、どの程度のことかは……","translatedEnglishLine":"How deeply interested he was—well, to what extent..."},{"lineNumber":70630,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、ご想像にお任せって感じかしら」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll leave that to your imagination."},{"lineNumber":70631,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみにホ・ラガさんはホモで、","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, Ho-Raga is gay,"},{"lineNumber":70632,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ブリティシュさんが好き」","translatedEnglishLine":"and likes British-san."},{"lineNumber":70633,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やだ、なんかすごいグループね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh my, what an amazing group."},{"lineNumber":70634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「日光さんだけ特にそういう色恋沙汰なし。","translatedEnglishLine":"Only Nikkō has no such romantic entanglements."},{"lineNumber":70635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　真面目一徹なのかしらん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe he's just very serious."},{"lineNumber":70636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ではまた！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, see you again!"},{"lineNumber":70637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へーーーーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heeeey!"},{"lineNumber":70638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「闘神都市に関しての話をしますわよー！","translatedEnglishLine":"Now I'll talk about the Fighting God City!"},{"lineNumber":70639,"originalJapaneseLine":"　聞いててね、あなた！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Listen up, you!"},{"lineNumber":70640,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この場合における闘神都市とは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Fighting God City in this case means,"},{"lineNumber":70641,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふわーっと浮かび上がる都市のことね、","translatedEnglishLine":"a city that floats softly in the air,"},{"lineNumber":70642,"originalJapaneseLine":"　武闘大会はいったん置いといて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Putting the martial arts tournament aside for now!"},{"lineNumber":70643,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そも、闘神都市とは何か！」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, what exactly is the Fighting God City?"},{"lineNumber":70644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは大昔の国家、聖魔教団ってところが、","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a floating city built by an ancient nation called the Holy Demon Church,"},{"lineNumber":70645,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争に利用する為に作った浮遊都市のことよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"constructed for use in war!"},{"lineNumber":70646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「空からの攻撃やら兵の投下で、","translatedEnglishLine":"With aerial attacks and troop deployments,"},{"lineNumber":70647,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争中にそれはもう大活躍したとか","translatedEnglishLine":"it was said to have been extremely active during the war."},{"lineNumber":70648,"originalJapaneseLine":"「制空権取れたら、そりゃ有利でしょうけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"If you control the skies, it's obviously advantageous, but..."},{"lineNumber":70649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んじゃ都市ごと飛ばそっか、ってなる辺りが、","translatedEnglishLine":"then they thought, 'Well, let's fly the entire city,' which is,"},{"lineNumber":70650,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんとも天才というか豪快というか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"somehow genius or just bold and audacious...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エターナルヒーロー！　略してエタヒの話！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Eternal Heroes! Shortened to Etahi!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっひょー！　ちゃーんと説明するから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Woohoo! I'll properly explain it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ね、ね、聞いて聞いて、聞いててね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, hey, listen, listen, please listen!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さって、エターナルヒーローとは何か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, what are the Eternal Heroes?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今を遡ること1500年前ほどにいた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were a party from about 1500 years ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 5人の史上最高のパーティーのことよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: five of the greatest party members in history."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼らはそれぞれに当時の魔王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Each of them sought power to fight against the Demon Lord of the time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ジル、そして魔人達と戦う為の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Jill, and the demon fiends,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力を求めて冒険していました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and went on adventures in search of that power."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その冒険がどういう結末を見たか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What kind of end those adventures met..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがもう！　語るも涙、聞くも涙の物語！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's a story full of tears to tell, and tears to hear!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おーいおいおい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, come on, come on!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「詳しいことは画像の説明を見てもらうとして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave the detailed explanation to the image caption...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人が倒せる魔剣カオスさん、聖刀日光さんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demonic sword Chaos who can defeat demons, and the holy sword Nikkō,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在に至る前、人間時代のパーティーだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: before the present time, were part of a human-era party,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思ってもらえばオーケかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you think of it that way, it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶっちゃけストーリーにガツンとは絡まないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be honest, this doesn't heavily affect the main story,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、日光、カフェ、ホ・ラガ、コンクリ男、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, Nikkō, Café, Ho-Raga, Concrete Man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この五人仲間だったんだーへーと思っといて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just keep in mind that these five were comrades—how about that!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時には街を支配する魔物達を懲らしめ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes punishing the monsters that ruled cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には当時の魔王であるジル様が作っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes liberating the human farms created by Demon Lord Jill,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間を奴隷化する人間牧場の開放を行ったり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which enslaved humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジル期という歴史上でもかなり厳しい時代を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They lived through the harsh era known historically as the Jill Period,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五人は駆け抜けていたそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the five of them persevered through it all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、最高のパーティーと言えど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, even as the greatest party,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当時はあまりに魔軍の勢力が強く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army's power was overwhelming at the time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順風満帆とはいかなかったそうだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so things didn't always go smoothly for them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにこのパーティーにいたカフェさんは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Café from this party,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶世の美女に姿を変えられていたものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was transformed into an unparalleled beauty,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在は呪いが解かれ元のお姿に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but now the curse has been lifted and she returned to her original form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分の姿への劣等感から美女になったけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She became a beauty out of an inferiority complex about her appearance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元の姿も充分可愛いわよねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but her original form is also pretty cute, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恋する乙女心は複雑なのかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A maiden's heart in love is complicated, I suppose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうそう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh yes, and speaking of which,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逆にそんなカフェさんが気になっていたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what Café was interested in, conversely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は魔剣と化したカオスさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is Chaos, who has become a demonic sword now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでも、魔人に殺された恋人が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, his lover who was killed by demons

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとカフェさんに似ていたんですって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somewhat resembled Café...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その気になる、が、どの程度のことかは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How deeply interested he was—well, to what extent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ご想像にお任せって感じかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave that to your imagination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにホ・ラガさんはホモで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Ho-Raga is gay,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブリティシュさんが好き」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and likes British-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やだ、なんかすごいグループね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh my, what an amazing group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「日光さんだけ特にそういう色恋沙汰なし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Nikkō has no such romantic entanglements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真面目一徹なのかしらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe he's just very serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ではまた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, see you again!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へーーーーい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heeeey!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神都市に関しての話をしますわよー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now I'll talk about the Fighting God City!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いててね、あなた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen up, you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この場合における闘神都市とは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fighting God City in this case means,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふわーっと浮かび上がる都市のことね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a city that floats softly in the air,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武闘大会はいったん置いといて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Putting the martial arts tournament aside for now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そも、闘神都市とは何か！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what exactly is the Fighting God City?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは大昔の国家、聖魔教団ってところが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a floating city built by an ancient nation called the Holy Demon Church,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争に利用する為に作った浮遊都市のことよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: constructed for use in war!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「空からの攻撃やら兵の投下で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With aerial attacks and troop deployments,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争中にそれはもう大活躍したとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was said to have been extremely active during the war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「制空権取れたら、そりゃ有利でしょうけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you control the skies, it's obviously advantageous, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んじゃ都市ごと飛ばそっか、ってなる辺りが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then they thought, 'Well, let's fly the entire city,' which is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとも天才というか豪快というか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow genius or just bold and audacious..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エターナルヒーロー！　略してエタヒの話！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Eternal Heroes! Shortened to Etahi!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっひょー！　ちゃーんと説明するから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Woohoo! I'll properly explain it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ね、ね、聞いて聞いて、聞いててね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, hey, listen, listen, please listen!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さって、エターナルヒーローとは何か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, what are the Eternal Heroes?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今を遡ること1500年前ほどにいた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were a party from about 1500 years ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 5人の史上最高のパーティーのことよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: five of the greatest party members in history."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼らはそれぞれに当時の魔王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Each of them sought power to fight against the Demon Lord of the time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ジル、そして魔人達と戦う為の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Jill, and the demon fiends,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力を求めて冒険していました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and went on adventures in search of that power."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その冒険がどういう結末を見たか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What kind of end those adventures met..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがもう！　語るも涙、聞くも涙の物語！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's a story full of tears to tell, and tears to hear!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おーいおいおい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, come on, come on!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「詳しいことは画像の説明を見てもらうとして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave the detailed explanation to the image caption...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人が倒せる魔剣カオスさん、聖刀日光さんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demonic sword Chaos who can defeat demons, and the holy sword Nikkō,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在に至る前、人間時代のパーティーだと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: before the present time, were part of a human-era party,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思ってもらえばオーケかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you think of it that way, it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶっちゃけストーリーにガツンとは絡まないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be honest, this doesn't heavily affect the main story,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、日光、カフェ、ホ・ラガ、コンクリ男、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, Nikkō, Café, Ho-Raga, Concrete Man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この五人仲間だったんだーへーと思っといて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just keep in mind that these five were comrades—how about that!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時には街を支配する魔物達を懲らしめ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes punishing the monsters that ruled cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には当時の魔王であるジル様が作っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes liberating the human farms created by Demon Lord Jill,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間を奴隷化する人間牧場の開放を行ったり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which enslaved humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジル期という歴史上でもかなり厳しい時代を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They lived through the harsh era known historically as the Jill Period,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五人は駆け抜けていたそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the five of them persevered through it all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、最高のパーティーと言えど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, even as the greatest party,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当時はあまりに魔軍の勢力が強く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army's power was overwhelming at the time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順風満帆とはいかなかったそうだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so things didn't always go smoothly for them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにこのパーティーにいたカフェさんは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Café from this party,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶世の美女に姿を変えられていたものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was transformed into an unparalleled beauty,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在は呪いが解かれ元のお姿に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but now the curse has been lifted and she returned to her original form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分の姿への劣等感から美女になったけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She became a beauty out of an inferiority complex about her appearance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元の姿も充分可愛いわよねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but her original form is also pretty cute, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恋する乙女心は複雑なのかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A maiden's heart in love is complicated, I suppose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうそう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh yes, and speaking of which,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逆にそんなカフェさんが気になっていたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what Café was interested in, conversely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は魔剣と化したカオスさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is Chaos, who has become a demonic sword now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでも、魔人に殺された恋人が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, his lover who was killed by demons

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとカフェさんに似ていたんですって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somewhat resembled Café...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その気になる、が、どの程度のことかは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How deeply interested he was—well, to what extent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ご想像にお任せって感じかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave that to your imagination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにホ・ラガさんはホモで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Ho-Raga is gay,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブリティシュさんが好き」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and likes British-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やだ、なんかすごいグループね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh my, what an amazing group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「日光さんだけ特にそういう色恋沙汰なし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Nikkō has no such romantic entanglements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真面目一徹なのかしらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe he's just very serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ではまた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, see you again!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へーーーーい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heeeey!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神都市に関しての話をしますわよー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now I'll talk about the Fighting God City!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いててね、あなた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen up, you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この場合における闘神都市とは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fighting God City in this case means,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふわーっと浮かび上がる都市のことね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a city that floats softly in the air,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武闘大会はいったん置いといて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Putting the martial arts tournament aside for now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そも、闘神都市とは何か！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what exactly is the Fighting God City?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは大昔の国家、聖魔教団ってところが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a floating city built by an ancient nation called the Holy Demon Church,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争に利用する為に作った浮遊都市のことよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: constructed for use in war!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「空からの攻撃やら兵の投下で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With aerial attacks and troop deployments,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争中にそれはもう大活躍したとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was said to have been extremely active during the war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「制空権取れたら、そりゃ有利でしょうけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you control the skies, it's obviously advantageous, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んじゃ都市ごと飛ばそっか、ってなる辺りが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then they thought, 'Well, let's fly the entire city,' which is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとも天才というか豪快というか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow genius or just bold and audacious..."
